alert.note: Alert for Comanche; Coryell; Hamilton; Lampasas; Mills (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued April 05 at 11:33AM CDT until April 05 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM CDT THIS EVENING FOR LOW HUMIDITY AND GUSTY WINDS FROM COMANCHE TO LAMPASAS TO GATESVILLE... * AFFECTED AREA...Comanche, Mills, Hamilton, Lampasas, and Coryell Counties. * TIMING...This Afternoon through 8 pm. * WINDS...Southwest 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 30 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 12 percent. * TEMPERATURES...Lower 90s. * IMPACTS...Any wildfires ignited may spread rapidly. Prevention of fire starts is encouraged by avoiding planned burning, or by limiting activities prone to producing sparks that can stop the start and spread of wildfires.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that extreme fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and dry vegetation can contribute to extreme fire behavior. Avoid all outside burning and welding today. Do not toss lit cigarette butts outside. Report wild fires to the nearest fire department or law enforcement office.
